alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 03 at 8:18PM PDT until April 05 at 3:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PDT MONDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, north winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, north to northeast winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. Isolated gusts to 65 mph around the Montecito hills Monday night. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Mountains. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 6 PM PDT Monday. For the High Wind Watch, from Monday evening through late Monday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
